Posts.Content: I start EC chemotherapy on may 13th , induction appointment on .10th . I was diagnosed with grade 3 invasive breast cancer on 5/3/19 , lumpectomy and lypmh nodes removed 15/3/19  follows by a other due to margins on 5/4/19 . At first I thought it would only be radiotherapy and tamoxifen but due to grade and also lymph node infected chemotherapy being given . It's all very stressful and I am sworried about the side effects . I have had my hair cut into a very short bob and I will try cold cap Good luck to all and stay strong  Xx
Posts.Title: **MAY 2019 BREAST CANCER CHEMOTHERAPY CHAT**
